name: 洪媽益
objective: 本課程旨在幫助學生熟稔運用基本重要文法以寫出正確自然, 表達清晰之句子.  內容包括語法結構和錯誤分析, 例如不完整句、誤置修飾語、不連結修飾語、散漫句、錯誤平行結構、易混淆字、贅詞等常見問題。
schedule:
Week 1 Orientation and assign textbook
Week 2 Paragraph Structure / Topic Sentence
Week 3 Supporting Sentences / Explaining with Examples
Week 4 Coherence and Unity / Expository Paragraphs
Week 5 Narrative Paragraphs / Sublist 6 Quiz
Week 6 Descriptive Paragraphs
Week 7 Holiday (April 6)
Week 8 (Types of) Enumeration / Sublist 7 Quiz
Week 9 Mid-terms
Week 10 Process Paragraphs
Week 11 Process Paragraphs / Sublist 8 Quiz
Week 12 Comparison and Contrast Paragraphs
Week 13 Comparison and Contrast Paragraphs
Week 14 Problem and Solution Paragraphs /Sublist 9 Quiz
Week 15 Classifying Paragraphs
Week 16 Defining / Opinion Paragraphs
Week 17 FINAL Exam / Sublist 10 Quiz
Week 18 Reports Due
scorePolicy:
Vocabulary Quiz 15%
Exercises 15%
Writing Homework (and Revisions) 40%
Mid-terms 15%
Finals 15%
materials: Donald et al. 1999. Writing Clear Paragraphs. 6th Ed. Prentice-Hall. (available at Crane)
